Description: A suburban Cicero gear manufacturing company pleaded guilty to illegally discharging industrial wastewater into the public sewer system and agreed to pay a $1.5 million fine. The defendant company, BRAD FOOTE GEAR WORKS, INC., began cooperating and taking remedial water treatment measures after federal environmental agents executed a search warrant in February 2011.

A Chicago-area alternative energy company agreed to settle allegations relating to accounting and disclosure violations that prevented investors from knowing that reduced business from two significant customers had caused substantial declines in the company's long-term financial prospects.
